comments.author: Dave
comments.body: JG and I got as far as Panorama Point... Nice elevation gain for hoofers, I think. The Wheeler visits the welder tomorrow. Hope something good comes of it. If the guy does a good job, I'll plug his shop. In fact, I think SB should start a "Preferred Vendors" section on the FFr. And a "Hygiene Tips for Lunchtime Warriors" page also. And a video collection. Come on, Steve; get the lead out.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: **Hygiene Tip #1**: _Never share an office with Dave._

comments.author: Tim
comments.body: Steve- How is it you've learned to not share space w/ Dave? It's too late for me. Has been for 10 years. I suspect I will have a court battle similar to the Rocky Flats employees of the '60s. I fear my exposure is exponentially worse.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Tim, I sympathize with your plight. Why do you think I always make my 301 ATLAS visits so brief?! All I can say, my friend, is **RISE UP!** Fight the power!!
